reviews.review: Still the best competitive FPS out there.

Very good game, especially if you like competitive games. But if you don't, not to worry because there are also servers where you can either chill out and practise to get better or just have fun and you can also play other fun game modes on servers and the maps on csgo are amazing and have alot of thought which has been put into them. Ands the price of the game is very effiecent. Have fun!

Load your AK, rush B and cyka blyat!

Counter Strike Global Offensive is a concrete follow up to CS Source. With constant updates and smooth gameplay it is near the perfect online shooter. But lets start with the bad points, first of all the game is riddled with hackers, which can ruin a ranked game as you are either forced to leave and accept a penalty or carry on playing through the practically unbeatable round. This is probably the worst aspect of the game other than this the fact that you have to now pay for gun customizations that are created by someone else is just terrible.

This said CSGO is one of the few games that has made E-sports what it is today, it is a fair game that you can just pick up and play. You always leave wanting just one more game.

Final verdict: 78%
